data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Pineda-Enriquez, Tania, Solis-Marin, Francisco A., Laguarda-Figueras, Alfredo (2014): Revision of the genus Ophioteichus H. L. Clark, 1938 (Ophiuroidea: Ophiolepididae). Zootaxa 3784 (3): 241-250, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3784.3.3
